manifest.name: @mdx-js/mdx
manifest.description: Parse MDX and transpile to JSX
manifest.readme:
# `@mdx-js/mdx`

[![Build Status][build-badge]][build]
[![lerna][lerna-badge]][lerna]
[![Join the community on Spectrum][spectrum-badge]][spectrum]

[MDX][] implementation using [remark][].

## Installation

[npm][]:

```sh
npm i -S @mdx-js/mdx
```

## Usage

```js
const mdx = require('@mdx-js/mdx')

const result = await mdx(`
# Hello, MDX

I <3 Markdown and JSX
`)

console.log(result)
```

Yields:

```js
export default ({components, ...props}) => (
  <MDXTag name="wrapper" components={components}>
    <MDXTag name="h1" components={components}>{`Hello, MDX`}</MDXTag>
    <MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`I <3 Markdown and JSX`}</MDXTag>
  </MDXTag>
)
```

## Contribute

See the [Support][] and [Contributing][] guidelines on the MDX website for ways
to (get) help.

This project has a [Code of Conduct][coc].
By interacting with this repository, organisation, or community you agree to
abide by its terms.

## License

[MIT][] © [Compositor][] and [Vercel][]
